price: Dize: "Aguardai-a! Por certo, sou dos aguardadores, convosco."
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
